meanings.definition: A distinctive atmosphere or quality that seems to surround and be generated by a person, thing, or place.
meanings.sent1: The aura of the forest was peaceful and calming.
meanings.sent2: She walked into the room, and her aura immediately brightened the space.
meanings.sent3: The aura around the cat made it look like a tiny king wearing an invisible crown.
meanings.sent4: His aura of confidence was so strong that it felt like a warm blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aura of excitement in the air was palpable as the concert was about to begin.

meanings.definition: A supposed emanation surrounding the body of a living creature and regarded as an essential part of the individual.
meanings.sent1: The healer claimed to see the aura of energy around each person.
meanings.sent2: Many believe that auras can reveal a person's emotional state.
meanings.sent3: The aura around the dog was so bright that it looked like a halo.
meanings.sent4: Her aura of kindness seemed to radiate outwards, touching everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The aura of mystery surrounding the old house made it a topic of local legends.

meanings.sent1: The aura of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The music had an aura of nostalgia that brought back memories.
meanings.sent3: The aura of perfume in the room was overwhelming but pleasant.
meanings.sent4: The aura of excitement before the big game was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The aura of anticipation before the surprise party was almost unbearable.
